CustomField.description: Solution to show Coop Dollars as a currency in an environment with Multi-currency enabled.
CustomField.formula: "$" & IF( Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c )), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Last_Year_s_Premium_CAP__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )
CustomField.label: Last Year's Premium CAP
